title: Individual Performance Dashboard
description: I developed an individual performance dashboard to provide employees with a clear overview of their performance metrics and goals. This dashboard aggregates key performance indicators (KPIs) in an easy-to-read format, allowing users to track their progress and identify areas for improvement.

skills: Database: Maria DB, Azure SQL Database
jd: Evaluated UI/UX design by working closely with a designer.
Analysed the database from Actionstep (legal software platform) to import data.
Developed a Power BI report to view an overview and details of timekeeper performance, matter type, work efficiency, skill efficiency, average hours by month, WIP by month, and related matters.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Wrote technical documentation and end-user manuals.
